Title: Shame
Plot: Franco's addiction to painkillers has driven him to a support group to get help with his problem.  A young boy clings to life after Tommy saves him from a fire.  Jerry is introduced to his gay son's life partner.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,offensive language and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Marlyne N. Afflack,  David Alan Basche,  Noelle Beck,  Jaime Lee Kirchner,  Ching Valdes-Aran,  Evan  Reilly,  Alexander  Flores,  James Miles,  Joseph E. Murray,  Doug  Moe,  Melissa Marie Sibila,  Jones Mille
